SEARCH
Package com.flightbookings.flight_bookings.services.interfaces

Interface SeatService

All Known Implementing Classes:
SeatServiceImpl
public interface SeatService
Interface for managing seat operations in the flight booking system.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Optional<Seat>
    getSeatById(Long seatId)
    Retrieves a seat by its ID.
    List<String>
    initializeSeats(Flight flight, int numRows)
    Initializes seats for a given flight.
    void
    initializeSeatsForAllFlights()
    Initializes seats for all flights in the system.
    Seat
    reserveSeat(Flight flight, String seatName)
    Reserves a seat for a given flight.

  • Method Details

    • getSeatById

      Optional<Seat> getSeatById(Long seatId)
      Retrieves a seat by its ID.
      Parameters:
      seatId - the ID of the seat to retrieve.
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the Seat object if found, or an empty Optional if not found.

    • initializeSeats

      @Transactional List<String> initializeSeats(Flight flight, int numRows)
      Initializes seats for a given flight.
      Parameters:
      flight - the flight for which seats are being initialized.
      numRows - the number of rows in the flight.
      Returns:
      a list of seat identifiers that were initialized.

    • initializeSeatsForAllFlights

      @Transactional void initializeSeatsForAllFlights()
      Initializes seats for all flights in the system.

    • reserveSeat

      @Transactional Seat reserveSeat(Flight flight, String seatName)
      Reserves a seat for a given flight.
      Parameters:
      flight - the flight for which the seat is being reserved.
      seatName - the name of the seat to reserve.
      Returns:
      the reserved Seat object.
